games.title: Playground Man! Ragdoll Show!
games.description:
üåü Welcome to the world of destruction and puzzles with ragdoll physics, where the wooden stickman is already waiting for your help! Immerse yourself in a physical playground full of destruction and relax, solving interesting puzzles.

A great free game for all fans of physics puzzles and ragdoll simulators. If you are a fan of such legendary games as Ragdoll Break: Let''s destroy! and Kick Master, then you have come to the right place. Here you will find many exciting adventures with a ragdoll stickman!

üî• Game features:
- Exciting levels with a variety of tasks that require creative solutions
- Funny ragdoll physics of destruction and interaction with objects of the world
- Compete in global leaderboards: show your best results and defeat other players.
- Play online from any device. Enjoy destruction on your smartphone or PC at any time.

‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Support us by leaving a short review. Your opinion will help us improve the game!
games.howToPlayText:
Looking for a relaxing casual 3D game with ragdoll physics? Solve puzzles and unlock new levels. 

üéØYour task: solve puzzles by controlling a stickman or other objects on the level.

üïπÔ∏èTo control, simply move your finger across the screen on a mobile phone or use the mouse with the left mouse button held down on a PC

games.title: Sprunki Sandbox: Ragdoll Playground Mode
games.description: Unleash chaos in this 2D ragdoll sandbox! Control Sprunki, destroy everything, and enjoy epic physics. Build, fight, and experiment with a vast arsenal‚Äîswords, guns, rockets, and more! Create traps, arenas, and battles. Your world, your rules‚Äîplay now!

Welcome to the 2D ragdoll sandbox. Control sprunki and cause real chaos! üî•üí£

games.title: Break Stick Completely
games.description: Dive into the quirky realm of Break Stick Completely, where you unleash mayhem with a stick figure. Use vehicles and obstacles to create comical chaos and rack up points through fun stunts. Accessible on phone and computer, this free game promises endless laughter and enjoyment.
games.howToPlayText:

games.title: Flip Gun 3D Ragdoll Shooter
games.description: Experience wild ragdoll physics and hilarious shooting action in Flip Gun 3D Ragdoll Shooter! Unlock weapons, conquer fun challenges, and send ragdolls flying in this addictive, stress-relieving online shooter game.
games.howToPlayText:
Tap to shoot and watch your gun flip as you aim at ragdoll targets

Use flip-based shooting mechanics to hit enemies and trigger hilarious ragdoll reactions

Strategically aim to break obstacles, solve challenges, and cause maximum destruction

Experiment with different weapons for varied flipping and shooting effects

Complete levels by knocking down all targets with limited shots

games.title: Dummies World Cup
games.description:
Get ready for an exciting football challenge with Dummies World Cup, where you take command of a dummy representing your favorite national team. Immerse yourself in this captivating football game as you strive to score as many goals as possible before the final whistle. Choose from 32 national teams inspired by FIFA and engage in thrilling matches that will test your skills and strategies!


Game tips
To enhance your gameplay, focus on quick movements to outwit your opponent while choosing the right timing to kick the ball. Use feints to confuse the rival dummy and create scoring opportunities. Practicing your shooting and positioning will also help you rack up those goals!


How to play
Playing Dummies World Cup is a breeze! Simply select your favorite team, then control your dummy on the pitch. On computer, navigate using the arrow keys and hit the spacebar to kick. On your phone, tap to choose and use on-screen buttons for movement and kicking actions. Stay focused and strike at the right moments to outscore your opponent!


How to play Dummies World Cup for free?
You can enjoy Dummies World Cup for free on Playhop. Just visit our platform and dive into this thrilling experience along with many other exciting online games!


Controls
On a computer, use the arrow keys to maneuver your player around the field. The spacebar is your go-to for shooting the ball into the opponent‚Äôs goal. On a mobile device, make use of the touch controls to guide your dummy and strike, ensuring you‚Äôre agile as you play against other national teams.
games.howToPlayText:
Drag and drop with the mouse or touch to throw your dummy in the direction of the arrow.
All you have to do is choose their favorite contending national from 32 teams (according to FIFA) and go head-to-head with the opponent team‚Äôs dummy.

games.title: Puppetman: Ragdoll Puzzle
games.description: Dive into the thrilling world of Puppetman: Ragdoll Puzzle, an engaging game that tests your cleverness and quick reactions. Navigate Poly through challenging levels with clever tactics to avoid crashes. With 15 progressively difficult stages, it offers an exciting challenge, whether on mobile or desktop.
games.howToPlayText:
Keyboard: Control is carried out by pressing  keys A, S, D .
Mobile: Control is carried out by pressing buttons on the screen.

games.title: Archer Ragdoll
games.howToPlayText:
Control the archer using the mouse or by touching the screen on the left highlighted part of the screen.

Hold the mouse (finger) behind the archer's back to draw the bow (no need to pull it horizontally). Keeping the bow drawn, aim and release.

games.title: Ragdoll Crash-Test: Throw and Break!
games.description: Ragdoll Crash-Test: Throw and Break! is a fun puzzle game centered around destruction. Enjoy throwing a stickman to shatter it into pieces online for free. With realistic physics and various challenges, the game guarantees non-stop fun and thrilling chaos.
games.howToPlayText:
üïπDrag the stickman onto the selected objects and watch the chaos unfold. Try to experiment with different objects to maximize damage.

üéØ Choose from a variety of objects to smash, hit, and drag the stickman. Each object has unique properties for maximum impact.

games.title: Stick Boy: Bazooka Ragdoll
games.description: Dive into the thrilling realm of Stick Boy: Bazooka Ragdoll, where strategy and chaos collide. Use various powerful bazookas to defeat enemies and destroy bases. Make smart choices in ammo to enjoy the chaos and lead Stick Boy to victory, available for free online on phones and computers.
games.howToPlayText:
Gameplay:

- To win: Destroy all enemies in the level
- Buy new weapons with unique bullets
- Defeat: If your Stick is destroyed by bullets or level hazards, and if you destroy hostages

Controls:

Hold down your finger on the screen or press and hold the Left Mouse Button to take aim.
Release to fire

Dazzling explosive effects and impressive physics turn each level into a unique puzzle

Accessible across devices, it delivers thrilling gameplay whether at home or on the move.
